title: Leading industries targeted by DDoS attack traffic 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of attack traffic for 8 number of Industrys.
The maximum Percentage of attack traffic 79.0 is found at Industry Gaming and the minimum is found at Media and entertainment where Percentage of attack traffic is 1.0.
There is a difference of 78.0 between the maximum Industry Gaming and minimum Industry Media and entertainment.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Percentage of attack traffic in the y axis.
Industry Gaming has the highest Percentage of attack traffic and Media and entertainment has the lowest Percentage of attack traffic.
